name: Cobots - a radioactive adventure
description:
The nuclear reactor is leaking and is in danger of a meltdown. The only hope is in the claws of two drones, to prevent the biggest atomic explosion the world has ever seen.

The two players controlling the drones have to cooperate in order to pick up the reactor and transport it safely into an isolation container. But be careful! The reactor is fragile and highly unstable.

At title screen, press any key to start. The game is for two players and is controlled like this:

  1. player: left: "A", up: "W", right: "D"
  2. player: left: left arrow, up: up arrow, right: right arrow

Made by:

Benjamin Blaabjerg (audio designer), Rasmus Jensen (programmer), Thorbjørn S. Kaiser (programmer), Christoffer Larsen (programmer), Jeanette Falk Olesen (game/level designer), Ludwig Sandbacka (art director/graphics artist)
